resources.string: This app aims to provide a clear introduction in C. through short descriptions and code snippets. at the end of every tutorial you will find a link to a video discussion (in arabic). feel free to leave any feedback and happy coding.

First of all C is a general purpose programming language, it\'s a Structured language(we will talk about this point a lot later), can handle low-level activities and it\'s the most widely used system programming language.

What is C used for mainly:
1) Operating systems programming(UNIX)
2) Language compilers(GNU)
3) Text editors(Gedit)
4) Network Drivers(LAN)
5) Data Bases(MYSQL)

To start writing C code you should\'ve two components. a compiler(which is used to translate your high-level code into machine language) search for GNU compiler, and an IDE, there are a lot of options, we are going to use netbeans through this tutorials.

To start writing out first program we should first open the IDE, i\'ll open netbeans(Run whatever ide you have downloaded) and select File >>new project.\n choose C Application and click next. give your project a name and specify it\'s path and click finish.\n you should end up with something like this.
Right click on source folder and choose new C main file, give it a name and click finish.

Now let's discuss those lines.
Line no. 14: you are telling the compiler to include the stdio(standard input/output) header file, which is responsible for handling both input and output operations.
From line 16 to line 18: it's called multi-line comments which is used to comment your code for hints and notes(comments never display with the program output).
 Line 19: this is the main function with is responsible for triggering the compiler t start do it's job, without the main function your code will never start.
Line 21: any function with a type( we will talk about Data type later) should return something with the same type, here the main function is of type int(integer) so it returns zero(which means the function is working).
Now to print our hello world message we just go inside the main function and use the printf function.
